description: Non material amendment to planning permission 17/4513/LBC dated 14/09/17 for `Conversion of loft space into habitual accomodation including insertion of 1 no, rooflight to the side elevation, 1no rooflight to the rear elevation and 1no casement window to rear gable wall. New bay window extension to rear elevation following relocation of existing shed to rear of the garden. Replacement of existing windows with new double glazed timber casement windows. New boiler flue to rear elevation. Alterations to pipework on elevations. Removal of boiler flue on rear elevation and render made good. New kitchen vent and cast iron downpipe. Tile ventilator terminals in side roof slope. Repairs to existing roof. Redecoration to external render, pipework and rainwater goods. New boundary hedge. Various internal alterations.` Amendments include change to the fenestration of the permitted bay window on the rear of the property
